critique: The executive order aims to evoke fear and disgust towards removable aliens by highlighting crimes committed by them and emphasizing the threat they pose to national security and public safety. It also intends to create a sense of joy among those who support stricter immigration enforcement and believe in prioritizing the safety of American citizens. There might be a sense of surprise at the extent of the measures being taken and the focus on sanctuary jurisdictions. There is no intention to evoke sadness.
